bill_title: authorize the state fire marshal to prohibit open burning.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize the state fire marshal to prohibit open burning. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-29B be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The state fire marshal, after consultation with the Governor and with local fire departments or fire officials serving the affected area, during periods of extremely dry conditions or under other conditions in which the state fire marshal finds that open burning constitutes a danger to life or property, may prohibit open burning in any area under state jurisdiction. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
